subject: Simsonn Pro X Ultra Pedals with Baseplate and Carbon Fiber Heel Plate
description_text:
Hi,

I was looking for the dimensions of this base plate and the dimensions of
the hole spacing.

The manuals section gives a 404 error. Could you send the details or even
better the PDF for the base plate please?


Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi Kerndegale,     Here is the ProX Ultra baseplate screenshot for your reference. The attachment was too large to be sent via email.
